main event: Two oblong, pale white, very bright objects were observed over Hamm, Norway on July 20, 1958.
interesting points: The objects resembled rockets and were about twice the size of a jet,The sighting lasted for approximately 7 minutes with no sound reported,The objects were observed by both US Navy pilots and confirmed by four additional witnesses on the ground,The objects left blue-white gas trails extending approximately seven times the length of the objects,They passed directly over the city of Oslo and were reported to be reflecting sunlight.
sighted object: Two oblong, pale white, very bright objects
witness description: Two US naval pilots and four observers in Oslo.
